app.title: Biochemical Pathway Explorer
app.subtitle: Navigate pathways, inspect molecules, and assemble custom views with interactive layouts.
app.footerNote: Data panels and visualizations coming next.

home.welcomeIntro: Start with an overview of curated biochemical pathways and connect related molecules to build interactive stories.

molecules.title: Molecule Library
molecules.description: Placeholder for molecule cards, filters, and structural previews. Add details such as molecular weight, charge, and pathway assignments here.

learn.title: Learn Modules
learn.description: Learning modules will introduce pathway concepts with guided steps, quizzes, and contextual molecule highlights.

pathways.title: Pathway Maps
pathways.description: Placeholder for interactive pathway diagrams. This area will host zoom, annotations, and export tools.

dashboard.title: Dashboard Overview
dashboard.description: Track pathway coverage, learning milestones, and molecule engagement with a structured, data-driven layout.

wrongbook.title: Wrongbook Review
wrongbook.description: Capture common mistakes, lab notes, and remediation steps to make review sessions more targeted.

about.title: About the Project
about.description: Biochem Visual is designed to make metabolic and signaling pathways accessible through interactive storytelling. This page can include team details, references, and roadmap updates.

map.title: Mini Metabolism Map
map.subtitle: Minimal interactive scaffold for the manuscript pathway view.
map.canvasDescription: Drag to pan, scroll to zoom, and select nodes to open details on the right.
map.nextStepsDescription: Swap in the full pathway SVG and hydrate these panels with real metabolite metadata.

glucose.label: Glucose
glucose.description: Entry point for glycolysis and pentose phosphate routing.
details: Highly regulated uptake in insulin-sensitive tissues.

g6p.label: G6P
details: Branch point into pentose phosphate pathway.

f6p.label: F6P
details: Feeds glycolysis and amino sugar synthesis.

fbp.label: FBP
details: Cleaved by aldolase into G3P and DHAP.

pyruvate.label: Pyruvate
pyruvate.description: Pyruvate connects glycolysis to mitochondrial entry.
details: Converted to acetyl-CoA via pyruvate dehydrogenase.

acetylCoa.label: Acetyl-CoA
acetylCoa.description: Acetyl-CoA fuels the TCA cycle and lipid synthesis.
details: Feeds citrate synthase to start TCA cycle.

citrate.label: Citrate
citrate.description: Citrate signals energy abundance to the cytosol.

atp.label: ATP
details: Produced in glycolysis and oxidative phosphorylation.

nadh.label: NADH
nadh.description: NADH shuttles electrons to the respiratory chain.
details: Generated in glycolysis and TCA cycle.
